metadataAttributes.Title: Managing Network Security
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Almost every organization uses computer networks to share their information and to support their business operations. When we allow network access to data  it is exposed to threats from inside and outside of the organization.  This course examines the threats associated with using internal and external networks and how to manage the protection of information when it’s accessible via networks.
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Herbert J. Mattord, Ph.D., CISM, CISSP, CDP
